[[Nickelodeon (Greece)]] |broadcast area = Greece |headquarters = [[Athens]], Greece |web= [http://www.mtvgreece.gr/ www.mtvgreece.gr] | |adsl serv 1= [[Conn-x TV]] |adsl chan 1= }} '''MTV Music''' is a 24 hour music channel playing non-stop music videos, live performances and artist interviews and it is available only on [[Conn-x TV]]. ==See also== * [[MTV Networks Europe]] * [[Music of Greece]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.mtvgreece.gr Official site] {{MTV Networks}} {{MTV Networks Europe}} {{Television in Greece}} [[Category:MTV Networks]] [[Category:Television channels in Greece]] [[Category:Greek-language television stations]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2009]] [[Category:Music video networks]]
